articles.title: Lion DNA convicts poachers in world first
articles.description: Investigators reveal how they were able to identify a missing animal using a database of lions in Zimbabwe.

articles.title: Cecil: The Lion and the Dentist review - inside the horrific big cat killing that outraged the world
articles.description: This documentary looks at the 2015 slaying of the majestic head of two lion prides in Zimbabwe, by a trophy-hunting American dentist. Sadly it raises more questions than it answers

articles.title: 'Good To See...': England Star Reacts To Australia's Group Stage Exit From T20 World Cup 2026
articles.description: Australia crashed out of T20 World Cup 2026 after losing back-to-back Group B matches against Zimbabwe (by 23 runs) and Sri Lanka (by 8 wickets).
